mapper.select: SELECT t1.ID_, t1.TYPE_ AS type, t1.TIME_ AS time, t1.USER_ID_ AS userId, t2.FIRST_ AS userName, t1.TASK_ID_ AS taskId, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.MESSAGE_ AS message, CONVERT (FULL_MSG_ USING utf8) AS fullMsg FROM act_hi_comment t1 INNER JOIN act_id_user t2 ON t1.USER_ID_ = t2.ID_ WHERE t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{value} and ACTION_='AddComment' ORDER BY t1.TIME_ ASC
